channel.title: Help with 2 weapons that glitched please! plus going invisble?
channel.description:
okay so i have this tri-godsword how can i make it weild like a double handed sword?? and hit like a normal sword...
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb395/thewindman/fdsafsd.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb395/thewindman/fdsfsfds.png[/img] THOSE ARE MY problems
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb395/thewindman/fgdgdgdgsgf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb395/thewindman/asffsaf.png[/img] THAT IS HOW I WANT IT...
also how can i fix my staff of light its slightly off...
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb395/thewindman/fdffsdfsdf.png[/img] thats problem
[IMG]http://i1203.photobucket.com/albums/bb395/thewindman/jkjhhjf.png[/img] thats how i want it
also if u could how come whenever i weild tri godsword and any legs like dragon legs, vesta skirt, anything that weilds in that spot i go invisble?? it happens with alot of other wepon and armour combinations how can i fix this
postin in both this section and model help not shur which one it goes in....
